Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.dole

Contains the Dole accretion simulation code and an example of how to use it.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DoleAccrete Dole.c - Planetary accretion algorithm, Icarus V 13 (1978) Ported from Public Domain C code originally written by Andrew Folkins.
DoleAccreteTest Simple test that generates a system.
DoleConstants Constants used by the Dole Accretion class.
DolePlanetRecord A bean class representing a planet for the Dole accretion code.
DolePlanetStats Planetstat : Compute the physical properties of a planet.
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.dole Description

Contains the Dole accretion simulation code and an example of how to use it.

Related Documentation

For more info please see:
  • Habitable Planets for Man by Stephen Dole. This paper contains quite a bit of the theory behind the equations in this package.
